title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2007.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2007.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Award means
general awards, academic performance awards and fellowships as these terms are
defined in section
2200.2
of Subchapter C of this

Chapter. (b) Institution means
college or vocational institution as these terms are defined by section
2001.1
of this

Subchapter. (c) Student means any
award recipient who has received payment of an award as defined herein either
directly or on his behalf. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2007.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
